front.title: The Mojette Transformation for the Erasure Coding of Files in NFSv4.2

abstract.t: Parallel NFS (pNFS) allows a separation between the metadata (onto a metadata server) and data (onto a storage device) for a file. The flex file layout type version 2 further allows for erasure encoding types to provide data integrity. In this document, a new erasure encoding type for the Mojette Transformation is introduced.
